transArray.content:
To be honest, more than 400 people booked a hotel near Tiananmen Square. I didn't have much hope. In addition, I arrived at the hotel at 12 o'clock in the evening. I really want to praise this hotel.
1. Location: Located in front of Qianmen Pedestrian Street, very convenient, very convenient, very convenient.
2. Room: I was surprised, every detail is a surprise, very considerate, although the room is not big, but the decoration is really like it. For example, hiding the luggage rack, such as the super intimate bedside lamp, I canâ€™t wait to move it home, haha
3. Service: Although I arrived at the store very late, the waiter has a super nice personality, and the two who look at the store seem to be two brothers and sisters.
4. Bed: super comfortable, pay attention to the bed, strongly recommended
